Armies of Ruin.description: Defend Hyrule Castle from an army of monsters!

The Sheikah Tribesman.description: Fight through the Eldin Caves! Who is Sheik?

The Sorceress of the Valley.description: Confront Cia, and close the Gate of Souls!

Land of Myth.description: Rescue Princess Ruto from... the Gorons?!

The Water Temple.description: Enter the Water Temple and defeat the faker!

Land of Twilight.description: Dispel twilight and fight on two fronts!

The Shadow King.description: Storm the palace of twilight! Cia and Lana are...?

Land in the Sky.description: Master, we must defend Skyloft from attack.

Sealed Ambition.description: Master, I detect a Gate of Souls. Proceed with closing it.

A War of Spirit.description: Go after Cia at the Temple of Souls!

Shining Beacon.description: Defeat Cia, once and for all.

March of the Demon King.description: Let nothing stand in the way.

Enduring Resolve.description: Hope is not lost! Defeat Zant and Girahim!

The Girl in the Green Tunic.description: Linkle's Tale - Recover the compass from Skull Kid!

Powers Collide.description: Linkle's Tale - Monsters in the Water Temple? Leave it to the hero!

The Demon Lord's Plan.description: Linkle's Tale - So many Imprisoned! At least they're tiny.

Her True Self.description: Linkle's Tale - Enter the palace and find Zelda!

The Dragon of the Caves.description: Cia's Tale - Time to recruit some generals...

The Usurper King.description: Cia's Tale - Subjugate the false king.

The Demon Lord.description: Cia's Tale - Subjugate the demon sword.

Darkness Falls.description: Cia's Tale - I am no one's puppet!
